subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: The 18th hole at the storied Plainfield Country Club is being shortened from 370 yards to 285 for the opener of the PGA Tour Playoffs for the FedEx Cup.
snippet: The 18th hole at the storied Plainfield Country Club is being shortened from 370 yards to 285 for the opener of the PGA Tour Playoffs for the FedEx Cup.
